alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 4:08PM AKST until November 17 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 PM AKST FRIDAY FOR TALKEETNA AND NORTH... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 25 inches. * WHERE...Susitna Valley, for Talkeetna and north. * WHEN...From 1 AM Wednesday to 5 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence is high that several rounds of snow will impact Susitna Valley from early Wednesday morning through at least Friday morning, leading to high snow accumulations over a multi-day period. Highest snow accumulations are expected along the Alaska Range, with forecast accumulations decreasing south towards Talkeetna.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
